scripts.build:release: ns build android --release --key-store-path key_store/my-app-android-key.jks --key-store-password ipsc_timer --key-store-alias myAlias --key-store-alias-password ipsc_timer --copy-to build/app-release.apk
scripts.gen_key: keytool -genkey -v -keystore key_store/my-app-android-key.jks -keyalg RSA -alias myAlias -keypass ipsc_timer -new ipsc_timer -storepass ipsc_timer -v
